column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Eunji - Thank you for your review. There's an old adage in the restaurant business that if you're not always evolving
column2: you're dying. So we are grateful that our corporate headquarters (we are a franchise concept) is always coming up with new menu items and new ideas to try. Some work
column4: but at the end of the day we are always moving forward.
